HorizontalItemListDiv.description: This is a horizontal list of items. It is a flex container with flex-direction set to row.

HorizontalItemListDivWithBorder.description: This is a horizontal list of items with customizable borders. It is a flex container with flex-direction set to row.

VerticalItemListDiv.description: This is a vertical list of items. It is a flex container with flex-direction set to column.

VerticalItemListDivWithBorder.description: This is a vertical list of items with customizable borders. It is a flex container with flex-direction set to column.

SimpleVerticalDropdown.description: This is a simple vertical dropdown component. It displays a list of items when clicked, with customizable border and arrow icons.
SimpleVerticalDropdown.label: string, required
SimpleVerticalDropdown.items: array of objects with properties: alt (string), label (string), onclick (function), optional

UploadFileWithPreview.description: This component allows users to upload a file and preview its text content. It supports optional border display and resizable text area.
UploadFileWithPreview.info: Supports file upload and text preview

SimpleBigTextInputWithRequired.description: This component is a large text input field with various customization options. It supports optional borders, custom dimensions, font size, and error handling.
SimpleBigTextInputWithRequired.info: Supports text input with customizable appearance and validation
SimpleBigTextInputWithRequired.label: string, optional
SimpleBigTextInputWithRequired.example:
<SimpleBigTextInputWithRequired showBorder width='90%' height='15rem' placeholder='Enter your text here...'
 label='Your Text' required errorMessage='This field is required.' />

SimpleInputWithRequired.description: This component is a simple input field with various customization options. It supports optional borders, custom width, font size, and error handling.
SimpleInputWithRequired.info: Supports text input with customizable appearance and validation
SimpleInputWithRequired.label: string, optional
SimpleInputWithRequired.example: <SimpleInputWithRequired showBorder width='90%' placeholder='Enter your text here...' label='Your Text' required errorMessage='This field is required.' />

NavBarNormal1.description: This component represents a normal navigation bar with customizable items.
NavBarNormal1.info: Supports navigation items with images, Supports border customization, Supports background blur effect
NavBarNormal1.items: array of objects with properties: src (string, required), alt (string), hover (boolean), onclick (function)

NavBarWithComponents1.description: This component represents a navigation bar with customizable items using child components.
NavBarWithComponents1.info: Supports navigation items as child components, Supports border customization, Supports background blur effect

SimpleScrollBar.description: This component creates a simple custom scrollbar using CSS.
SimpleScrollBar.info: Supports customization of scrollbar color, background color, hover color, width, border radius, and background shadow
SimpleScrollBar.example: <SimpleScrollBar color='red' backGroundColor='white' hoverColor='black' width='15px' borderRadius='5px' backGroundShadow='rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)' />

SimpleButton1.description: This component is a customizable button with various styling options and an onClick event handler.
SimpleButton1.info: Supports customizable appearance and behavior for a button
SimpleButton1.label: string, optional, default='Click me!'
SimpleButton1.example:
<SimpleButton1
  label='Submit'
  width='150px'
 height='40px'
 bgColor='#4CAF50'
 borderRadius='5px'
  borderWidth='2px'
 borderColor='#4CAF50'
 boxShadowColor='#888888'
  color='white'
 fontSize='1em'
  hoverBgColor='#45a049'
  transformScale={1.05}
 transitionTime='0.2s'
 onClick={() => alert('Button clicked!')}
  />

SimpleSmallPopUp.description: This component represents a small popup with customizable content and appearance.
SimpleSmallPopUp.info: Supports display and customization of a small popup with optional auto-hide feature
SimpleSmallPopUp.label: string, required
SimpleSmallPopUp.example:
<SimpleSmallPopUp
 label='This is a PopUp!'
 show={showPopUp}
 onClose={() => setShowPopUp(false)}
 />
